description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 3/06/2006

Dante learns that Felicia’s organs are failing and makes a promise to Felicia to raise Dominick in the best way possible. Ridge pressures Brooke to tell Nick that she is in love with Ridge. Stephanie corners Brooke and tells Brooke that a decision must be made between Nick and Ridge. Meanwhile, the wedding guests are shocked by Nick breaking up the wedding and are downstairs clueless as to what is going on upstairs with Brooke, Nick and Ridge.
